mapper.select: select * from hair_style hs left join hair_attach ha on hs.hair_no=ha.hair_no order by hs.hair_no
mapper.insert: insert into hair_style(hair_type, hair_time, hair_price) values (#{hair_type}, #{hair_time}, #{hair_price})
insert into hair_attach(hair_filename, hair_no) values (#{hair_filename}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
mapper.select: select hair_filename from hair_attach where hair_no=#{hair_no} order by hair_regdate
